root-command-language-usage.other: 'lang' defines the language according to IETF BCP 47

root-command-long-description.description: long description for the root command
root-command-long-description.other:
A longer description that spans multiple lines and likely contains
		examples and usage of using your application. For example:
		
		Cobra is a CLI library for Go that empowers applications.
		This application is a tool to generate the needed files
		to quickly create a Cobra application.

root-command-short-description.description: short description for the root command
root-command-short-description.other: A brief description of your application

using-config-file.description: Message to indicate which config is being used
